text: Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 58. I will not teach Dhamma to a person with a staff in his hand who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๕๘. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้มีไม้พลองในมือ”
58. I shall not teach Dhamma to one with a staff in his hand who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
